title: solr-common 1.4-SNAPSHOT is not in maven2 repository
description: Looking at the apache maven2 repository (http://people.apache.org/repo/m2-snapshot-repository/) solr-common-1.4-SNAPSHOT is missing

comments.author: Uri Boness
comments.content: Actually, the same issue is with solr-lucen-contrib library (the pom's are there, but not the jar)

comments.author: Ryan McKinley
comments.content:
In 1.4, solr-common.jar is now bundled with solr-solrj.

There is no longer any solr-common.jar – perhaps the SNAPSHOT poms are left over from when there was? (a few months back...)

comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.content:
Uri,

Is there anything left to do on this?  If not, please close/resolve.
